revised_title: NMR Imaging: Recent Developments and Future Prospects - Closing Remarks
tldr: This article discusses recent advancements and future prospects in nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) imaging. It covers various topics, including solid imaging, free radical imaging, microscopy, ultra-fast snapshot imaging, and spectroscopic imaging. The author highlights the challenges and potential applications of NMR imaging, emphasizing its growth and impact on medical research.
